thread.title: Police Searching for Suspects, After Comeau Jewelry Burglarized
thread.title_full: Police Searching for Suspects, After Comeau Jewelry Burglarized - FOX 14 TV Joplin and Pittsburg News Weather Sports |

author: Diane Gerstenfeld
title: Police Searching for Suspects, After Comeau Jewelry Burglarized
text:
PITTSBURG, KANSAS - Burglars broke in to Comeau Jewelry in Pittsburg this morning and stole an undisclosed amount of merchandise.
Pittsburg Police were called to the scene at 5:15 this morning.
Owner Chad Comeau says he believes the thieves broke in through the front door and ransacked three jewelry cases.
Comeau says his second location in Joplin was hit seven to eight years ago, but this is the first burglary at his Pittsburg store.
